name: Alan Solutions
overview:
Alan solutions, an internet based web solution providers started with a team of aspiring web technocrats. Aimed at providing web service consulting and solutions, Alan solutions is providing innovative and affordable Web solutions that enable organizations of all sizes to achieve their online objectives.

Alan solutions is an offshore professional internet strategy and web development company focusing on quality Web Design & Software Development Services. We specialize in high quality Website design, Web promotion, Flash, Animation, Multimedia, Corporate Identity and Print Graphics at reasonable cost and serving a variety of clients across the world

We understand your needs and with our technical team we are able to utilize the creative and technological know-how to build a bespoke solution that will support your business for the current trend and also for the future.

We Design and Develop all kinds of Websites and Applications with the below mentioned Technologies.

PHP 4,5/MySQL, CMS like Drupal, Joomla, Magento, Word Press, Zencart, Ubercart, Typo3, Moodle, OS Commerce. HTML/CSS, DHTML, SHTML, XHTML. Ajax, Javascript, Mootools, Jquery UI Integration for all the above mentioned CMS. Payment integration. API integrations. Symfony and Codeignitor frameworks. Flash Development and Graphic Designing.
